dict.string: Takes a number to what slide the presentation should go. Values greater than the actual number of slides will always let the presentation to the last slide.
Positive edge trigger to transition to the next slide
Positive edge trigger to transition to the previous slide
The machine name on which the proxy is running must be entered here. It has to match with the paramter for the machine name of the Presentation Proxy
Allows control of a PowerPoint or Keynote Presentation
